hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated by A'mash with the same chain of narrators and the transmitters said:He tore and called

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ ضَرْبِ الْخُدُودِ وَشَقِّ الْجُيُوبِ وَالدُّعَاءِ بِدَعْوَى الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of striking one's checks, tearing one's garment and calling with the calls of Jahilliyyah
